message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you get $30. It's a good offer considering the inflation.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. Let's be more equitable. I propose a 60/40 split.
Bob, the clock is ticking and our money is losing value fast. I'll come down to $65, but that's my final offer.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm being more than fair, but we're both losing out the longer this goes on. 55/45 is my final offer.
